text.Words: Do be aware that this game contains flashing images, lights, trippy effects and fast moving backgrounds. If you have epilepsy, or similar condition(s), I would highly recommend that you Don't play this game. otherwise go ahead :]

<--Controls--> 
 Shoot: Z/M 
 Move: WASD/arrows 
 Dash: Spacebar 
 Change weapons: X-C/N-M
